text: ISOLATION LEVELS SERIALIZABLE: Obtain all locks first; plus index locks, plus strict 2PL. REPEATABLE READS: Same as above, but no index locks. READ COMMITTED: Same as above, but S locks are released immediately. READ UNCOMMITTED: Same as above, b dirty reads (no S locks). ë 14 — DI @ 1:18:59/1:20:37 - PARTITION-BASED TIO - WRITES > ŒÏ Ë Œ|- I |" CMU Database Systems - 18 Timestamp Ordering Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
